casebody.data:
BROWN, Respondent, v. METROPOLITAN ST. RY. CO., Appellant. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

October 29, 1900.) Action by Sophie F. Brown against the Metropolitan Street-Railway Company. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendant appeals. Affirmed. Henry A. Robinson, for appellant. M. P. O’Connor, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
